Class BasePoller

java.lang.Object
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.comm.BasePoller
All Implemented Interfaces:
DevicePoller
Direct Known Subclasses:
CohuPTZPoller, DXMPoller, MonStreamPoller, NatchPoller, PelcoPPoller, StreambedPoller, ViconPTZPoller
public abstract class BasePoller extends Object implements DevicePoller
BasePoller is a class polling devices using a selector.
Author:
Douglas Lau, John L. Stanley
